Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Émilie Laetitia Boucher on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Having worked for over 23 years, Émilie Laetitia Boucher brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Émilie Laetitia Boucher and Bonnet tied the knot in 2009. Émilie and Bonnet have 1 child, named Garcia.
Education Background:
In 1996, Émilie finished her secondary school education at Lycée du Parc.
Émilie completed her university studies at École Nationale d'Administration (ENA) in 2001.
Occupation History:
Émilie Laetitia Boucher is a 46 year old and comes from France.
At Compagnie de Phalsbourg, Émilie Laetitia Boucher held the position of Property Manager from 2002 to 2005, developing essential skills in the field.
In 2005, she moved to Groupe Casino to work as a Developer, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 330000 EUR.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 3430000 EUR.

She inherited 2290000 EUR from her grandfather, a well-known Oil and Gas Executive, in 2009, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
